website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction of people towards the New Balance Fresh Foam Crag v2 has been positive. This trail running shoe is praised for its nostalgic design, the traction-ready outsole, and the comfortable midsole. The shoe captures the best of style and function and puts them together for an off-road runner that is soft, light, and efficient.
pros: The Fresh Foam midsole unit of the New Balance Fresh Foam Crag v2 is praised for being responsive and comfortable
The durability of the materials is praised by those who appreciate long-lasting shoes
A few testers believe that the outsole is efficient on both the trails and flat surfaces
The classic ‘90s look of the facade is appealing to those who appreciate the nostalgia
Breathability is a trait that is nicely perceived, based on a couple of reviews
cons: A couple of testers believe that the in-shoe wrap is restrictive because of the presence of too many overlays
The facade looks bulky, according to a consumer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a womens size 9 sneaker in a wide width and often buy men's shoes, especially New Balance, to get the width I need. I bought the men's 7.5 2E and it fits as expected and is wide enough, with enough room for a light sock. Now that I've worn them a couple of times they've softened up and conformed to my feet, and I mostly wear them without socks. They have a good tread and a stable sole for light hiking.
customer_reviews.author: La Bonita

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOOKING BUT MUSHY FIT
customer_reviews.text: Liked the "look", and build seemed ok, but fit was a bit sloppy- Would have preferred a wider/beefier outersole for extra stability & durability. Sorry, but the obsession with lightness and flash is lacking in substance. These should not be toys, but real-world tools for outdoor intensive use.
customer_reviews.author: DESERT-TEK

customer_reviews.title: Great look, bit fits narrow even in Wide.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in a wide, but they didn't feel like a wide. I think I'll get shoe stretchers and see if that makes a difference. I don't know what new balance is thinking about, going from a wide toe box to a narrow uncomfortable toe. Who are you making shoes for, just saying.....
customer_reviews.author: Sportek for life

customer_reviews.title: The width is a little narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The size was 11 2E. The shoe was a little narrow. More properly an 11E. If you have a wide foot then you need a wider size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small toe box even in a wide
customer_reviews.text: Might return. The length is true to size. Shoe is very light. Upper shoe material is very thin. Not sure it can withstand trail walks. Insole is paper thin with no arch support. I planned to change this regardless but it isn't for everyone. Unfortunately someone reviewed theses as small in the toe area after I ordered. They're right. Ordered an 11w and it barely fits in width at the ball of your foot then narrows for your toes. A half size bigger would be better but still wouldn't be a sufficient toe box for a trail walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size !! ..Now Watch it wear out like anything. Zero Quality Control..
customer_reviews.text: Updated Aug12th 2020. Reduced to 1 star.. Ripped off with a span of 3 months. What can I say , I had to throw it away.. Made in some low paying nation. Coming off the toxic, low quality manufacturing plant Just because you are of a particular size , doesn't mean it fits. This shoe is narrow. I have a requirement of 7.5 X-wide. Since this doesn't come in X-wide. Chose 2d (just wide). Luckily, I have small legs and hence it fits. Don't understand why they don't keep the size across all models. A good shoe. Let me see how long it lasts. I burn quite some miles / week.
customer_reviews.author: Guru H

customer_reviews.title: Way to small...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason New Balance sneakers never seems to fit. Either they run to big or to small. I'm very disappointed!! I won't be buying new balance sneakers online anymore
customer_reviews.author: ExtendedRoar

customer_reviews.title: Black and Charcoal are Ugly Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shows are super ugly, I thought the black and grey color scheme was dope, but the large soles with “FRESH FOAM” on them looks bad. I’ve only purchased New Balance trail running shoes for 5 years now but these are definitely the ugliest ones. I don’t think trail shoes are fashionable or the trend, I don’t wear them other then on the trails, but even for trail running shoe standards, these are SUPER UGLY!
customer_reviews.author: Rogerdodger

customer_reviews.title: For the price...
customer_reviews.text: They are not screaming style but for the price they are worth it. I usually wear a 12-12.5. I ordered a 13 and they are ok. I probably will use these for errand shoes or shorter runs. Also, the toe box is slim compared to most NB shoes I have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: alan r gann

customer_reviews.title: New balance
customer_reviews.text: Please orde a size up or a half size up shoes looks great just a bit small. I regularly wear a 13 I ordered a 13w to make sure I have toe room but the shoe tip of the toe still aggressively touches it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Bryant

customer_reviews.title: To small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I won't be buying new balance sneakers online anymore. I'm very disappointed!!! Looks better in pictures than in real life.
customer_reviews.author: ExtendedRoar

customer_reviews.title: Width is small
customer_reviews.text: Good hike with these over the weekend. Width is small. Grip on rocky trails was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: johnvonc

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: On day one I knew these were going to be a winner. So much so I considered ordering a second pair to keep in reserve. Three miles every morning and extremely happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: 16 Wide (comfortable)
customer_reviews.text: Love the style just as much as the comfortable I definitely will buy a pair in another color I got a 16 wide. They were a little creased in the toe part but I think that’s mainly because the size of my feet idk but I still like them
customer_reviews.author: Rasalic Mackey

customer_reviews.title: order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: My size ten didn't fit at all. I have worn size 10ee new balance for more than 25 years and this shoe is very small order 1 full size larger . if you want to wear them
customer_reviews.author: jeff wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wide and got regular fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, I didn't get the exact size I was expecting. I would have returned them, but I was had to have the shoes for a run, so I had to wear them. Would be awesome shoes if they were the wide fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mudkicker

customer_reviews.title: A little snug
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2e version and the shoe was a little snug. Wish they had the 4e Option when I purchased. Other than that the shoe is very soft and comfortable. I wear them at work where I'm walking constantly on hard concrete and they feel great. Hopefully it'll last for more than 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jon

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in wide, needed extra wide but it was not available.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, but fits narrow even in Wide. I think they could be more comfortable with wear so I chose to keep them. The colors are perfect for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sportek fan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased these and returned the 12 for a 13. Fit could be a little small. He has been running everyday and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Angry but not Lewis Black angry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My 17-year-old son loves these shoes. I really like the style and they are excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: bugsinlove

customer_reviews.title: These run small.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great to wear these but they are not true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was drawn to the color choices and style. I favor New Balance over other manufacturers. Shoes fit well, look stylish and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: john adrion

customer_reviews.title: would by again
customer_reviews.text: the shoes fit good.....I went with a wide shoes...next time definitely go with a extra wide shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: narrow
customer_reviews.text: very narrow and size runs way small. go half size up and wide!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lacoste

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than crag v1
customer_reviews.text: Fit much tighter around the toes than the original crag v1. If you thought the crag v1 fit too loose this is the show for you.
customer_reviews.author: The Spruce Caboose

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for running and CrossFit. They look cool and provide good support.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Burns

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable to work and walk in
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4star because they are comfortable But they look cheap
customer_reviews.author: Skinnymama

customer_reviews.title: So much support!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! So much cushion on my trail hikes and even just long walks in the neighborhood. I will be buying a back up pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Look great but the sizing is way off. Way too narrow and short. I’ve worn once. Goodwill is the next step.
customer_reviews.author: Buff Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Forget the color, these are very comfortable with. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: Benn Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Quality sneaker awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Another great sneaker by New balance, very comfortable, love the price
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Gold

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I have worn size 8 wide for many years. I bought these in 8 wide and they are Very narrow. I have returned then as they are not true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoran Son

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected for a wide sneaker too narrow
customer_reviews.author: Louis Carey

customer_reviews.title: This fit is much more narrow than most New Balance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the shoe, but I had to return it because it didn't fit. Unfortunately with the new slower shipping times, I didn't have a way to purchase a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love em! Be careful of the width. They fit a little tight (side to side)
customer_reviews.author: dale turek

customer_reviews.title: GOOD ALL PURPOSE SHOE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT. JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR. I'VE BEEN A NEW BALANCE CUSTOMEER FOR A WHILE BUT I LIKE YOUR SHIPPING BETTER THEN THE NEW BANCE WEB SITE. THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: GLENN

customer_reviews.title: Loves these sneakers 😬
customer_reviews.text: Being that the price of these sneakers are So inexpensive I thought that they would not be comfortable and not so stylish boy was I wrong the sneakers are more than comfortable and I get a lot of compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: Kenon Downs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a bit hesitant about buying foot wear on line without seeing how they feel because I need a wider size but, the NB Fresh Foam Trail Running show fit s me perfect!! Great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great for trails and running with the dog, super comfortable. Excellent shoe for the price
customer_reviews.author: george melton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so comfortable! Absolutely love it! I've been wearing New Balance shoes for 20 years and this shoe is one of the best I've had. I also have a wide foot and the size worked.
customer_reviews.author: Garth J Gilmartin

customer_reviews.title: shoe's run small
customer_reviews.text: I got size 13 2e wide width, and even though the size is correct on the tag, they are anything but wide width. other than them running small everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: daniel youmans

customer_reviews.title: they grip like no other
customer_reviews.text: wow, these grip better than any hiking boot, and the laces stay firm no matter where/how you tighten them so different section can be loose of tight.
customer_reviews.author: John Goren

customer_reviews.title: New Balance are great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy New Balance shoes for my foot issues and my podiatrist recommends them
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. It was the same size I always wear. But it was completely too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value!
customer_reviews.text: Love these New Balance sneakers - saved for date nights and hitting the malls
customer_reviews.author: Jose Amoro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thank so much guys have my sneakers thanks so much be safe everyone😊
customer_reviews.author: Bartolo carrion Jr

customer_reviews.title: extra wide NOT WIDE!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet this is not for you!! Even with the Extra wide like I order!!
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Great Newbies
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and feel great. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jackson

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Mtcrglr2 Running Shoe
feature_bullets: 8 mm drop: due to variances created during the development and manufacturing processes, all references to 8 mm drop are approximate
Bootie construction for a custom like fit
Fresh Foam innovative midsole created from a single piece of foam that provides a plush, more natural ride
